column4: when playing audio using xine, xine always notifys that the audio device is busy/used by a different program. is there some way to check which proccess locks my soundcard. Are there programs known for doing this?

Secondly, I found out my kernel only loads these modules at boot: fuse, lp and sbp2. Should it not also load a module for my soundcard, and isn't this very poor (in number). I found this information form /etc/modules.
lsof | grep snd   gave me nothing
